meanings.definition: Not able to be killed or destroyed.
meanings.sent1: The superhero had an unkillable shield that protected him from all harm.
meanings.sent2: The ancient dragon was said to be unkillable by any weapon known to man.
meanings.sent3: The unkillable cockroach survived yet another attempt to squish it.
meanings.sent4: Her spirit was unkillable, enduring every hardship that came her way.
meanings.sent5: The legend spoke of an unkillable beast roaming the forest, striking fear into all who crossed its path.

meanings.definition: Incapable of being killed or destroyed.
meanings.sent1: The unkillable monster in the video game was the final boss that many players struggled to defeat.
meanings.sent2: The magical amulet granted the wearer unkillable protection from any harm.
meanings.sent3: The unkillable plant in the garden seemed to thrive no matter the weather conditions.
meanings.sent4: His determination was unkillable, pushing him to overcome every obstacle in his path.
meanings.sent5: The fortress was built to be unkillable, with walls so strong that no enemy could breach them.
